p: Overall, 1.2% (95% CI 0.8 to 1.7%) of the study population were infected with T. pallidum in this study, which was markedly higher than the estimated prevalence for the 15â€“59-year group in China (0.02%) [ 2]. A high proportion of ever using injection drugs (3.41%) is likely a main reason for this increased risk of T. pallidum infection in the region.
